verses.verse: Now <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, Get thee <S%H3212>out<s%> of thy <S%H776>country<s%>, and from thy <S%H4138>kindred<s%>, and from thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> that I will show <S%H7200>thee<s%>:

and I will make of <S%H6213>thee<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H1431>thee<s%>, and make they <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%>; and be thou a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>:

and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them that <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H7043>thee<s%>, and him that curseth thee will I <S%H779>curse<s%>: and in thee shall all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.

So <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H3876>him<s%>; and Lot <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H87>him<s%>: and Abram was <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of <S%H2771>Haran<s%>.

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, and all their <S%H7399>substance<s%> that they had <S%H7408>gathered<s%>, and the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that they had <S%H6213>gotten<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran<s%>; and they went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; and into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%>.

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, unto the <S%H436>oak<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh<s%>. And the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto <S%H87>Abram<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>: and there <S%H1129>builded<s%> he an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, who appeared unto <S%H7200>him<s%>.

And he <S%H6275>removed<s%> from thence unto the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent<s%>, having <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%>, and <S%H5857>Ai<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%>: and there he <S%H1129>builded<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>, going <S%H1980>on<s%> <S%H5265>still<s%> toward the <S%H5045>South<s%>.

And there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>: and <S%H87>Abram<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H7458>there<s%>; for the famine was <S%H3515>sore<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it came to <S%H834>pass<s%>, when he was come <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, that he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou art a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> to look <S%H4758>upon<s%>:

and it will come to <S%H4713>pass<s%>, when the Egyptians shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H559>thee<s%>, that they will say, This is his <S%H802>wife<s%>: and they will <S%H2026>kill<s%> <S%H2421>me<s%>, but they will save thee alive.

Say <S%H559><s%>, I pray <S%H4994>thee<s%>, thou art my <S%H269>sister<s%>; <S%H4616>that<s%> it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with me for thy <S%H5315>sake<s%>, and that my soul may <S%H2421>live<s%> because of <S%H1558>thee<s%>.

And it came to <S%H87>pass<s%>, that, when Abram was <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> that she was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3303>fair<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1984>her<s%>, and praised her <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: and the <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And he <S%H3190>dealt<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H87>Abram<s%> for her <S%H6629>sake<s%>: and he had sheep, and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H2543>he-asses<s%>, and <S%H5650>men-servants<s%>, and <S%H8198>maid-servants<s%>, and <S%H860>she-asses<s%>, and <S%H1581>camels<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5060>plagued<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5061>plagues<s%> because <S%H1697>of<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>, <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, What is this that thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> unto <S%H5046>me<s%>? why didst thou not tell me that she was thy <S%H802>wife<s%>?

why saidst <S%H559>thou<s%>, She is my <S%H269>sister<s%>, so that I <S%H3947>took<s%> her to be my <S%H802>wife<s%>? now therefore behold thy <S%H802>wife<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3212>her<s%>, and go thy way.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> gave <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6680>charge<s%> concerning <S%H7971>him<s%>: and they brought him on the way, and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and all that he had.
